events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred yesterday evening at an intersection involving their vehicle and another driver.
After reviewing the initial incident report, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident to proceed with specialized handling.
A claims agent experienced in automobile accidents was assigned to the case to ensure prompt and accurate processing.
The claimant was contacted and the receipt of the claim was acknowledged along with explanation of the next steps.
The claimant was asked to submit the police report, photos of the damaged car, and a repair estimate for further evaluation.
The claimant submitted all requested documentation including police report, photos, and repair shop estimate as requested.
The claims investigation team began a thorough review of submitted documents and initiated contact with involved parties.
The investigation confirmed the circumstances of the collision and verified the claimant’s responsibility and coverage.
A settlement offer was prepared based on the repair costs and policy limits, and then communicated to the claimant.
The claimant provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the speed and clarity of the settlement proposal.
Final approval of the claim was granted, confirming coverage of the damages as outlined in the policy terms.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued to the claimant’s chosen repair shop to begin vehicle repairs.
The claim was closed successfully after payment confirmation and repair completion notification from the claimant.
All claim documentation and communication were archived according to company protocol for future reference.
